title: Bobby Reveals a Strange Grooming Habit + Bobby’s Top 10 Country Songs of the Decade + Mailbag: Listener Wants To Propose on Christmas
itunes:title: Bobby Reveals a Strange Grooming Habit + Bobby’s Top 10 Country Songs of the Decade + Mailbag: Listener Wants To Propose on Christmas
description:
Bobby asks Amy how she feels about body hair on guys which leads to a new revelation about how what he does to his armpit hair. Bobby reveals his top picks on his list of Top 10 Country Songs of the Decade. Bobby opens up the Mailbag about a listener who wants to propose on Christmas without it being cliché.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
